messages.entrancePic5: 24/7 Live Moderation combined with innovative technological solutions!
messages.pleaseEnterLogin: A Chobot name is necessary. Please fill in field 'Name'
messages.activationText: An activation email was sent. Just click on the link in that email to activate your account. If the email address {0} is wrong, create a new account!

messages.rule2: Any expression implying sexual or violent content is not permitted

messages.rules4: Bear in mind that you are a little Chobot. Therefore, any other expressions or behavior not appropriate for children is not permitted

messages.dontUseRealName: Do not use your real name

messages.fullChatDescription: Full chat allows your child to communicate freely
messages.agreeToFollow: I agree to follow these rules
messages.agreeWithAgreement: I agree with license agreement described above
messages.newAccountText: I agree with license agreement described above
messages.whyActivateDescription: If you want to have full chat, send messages, make friends, give and receive presents and use many other features you need to activate your account
messages.entrancePic3: Join the biggest Kid's Community of Earth Researchers! Chat and Make Friends!
messages.rules0: Like any other society, Chobots world has its own laws that have been drawn up to keep this virtual playground safe and joyful for you. Please be aware of the following chat and behavior code when you play Chobots:
messages.agreeTermsChild: My parents and I agree to
messages.childRegistration: Parents have to activate your account by clicking on the link in the email. Until your Chobot is activated, you will be able to login to play, but with limited possibilities
messages.entrancePic2: Play Collaborative Casual Games Designed for the Whole Family! 100% Free!
messages.guestText: Playing as a Guest is good to check out Chobots.com, but if you want to have full access to all the amazing features of our virtual world, you have to register!
messages.rules1: Please do not ask or mention your personal information, such as real name, phone number, and home address. For example you can say “I live in New York”, but no other details such as your street address
messages.rule1: Please do not ask or mention your personal information, such as real name, phone number, and home address. For example you can say “I live in New York”, but no other details such as your street address
messages.emailDescription: Please fill in your email address so that we could send a verification mail
messages.passwordRestored: Please, check your email for your password
messages.restorePasswordDescription: Please, enter the email address (the one you registered your chobot on), in the field below to restore your account’s password
messages.safeChatDescription: Safe chat limits your kid’s ability to share private information
messages.rules3: Teasing other users with conversation or actions is not permitted
messages.rule3: Teasing other users with conversation or actions is not permitted
messages.badEmail: The email address is not entered correctly. Please try again
messages.familyIsFull: The family registered on your e-mail has 7 registered accounts already
messages.pleaseEnterPassw: The password is too short, it must be at least 6 characters. Use from 6 to 20 characters
messages.badConfirmPassw: The two passwords do not match. Please try again
messages.outdatedSwf: The version of Chobots in your computer is outdated. You need to clear out your browser cache.
messages.restoreWrongEmail: There are no registered accounts on the mentioned email address
messages.unknown: Unknown error. You might need to clear out your browser cache.
messages.loginOrPasswordInvalidChars: Use only english letters and numbers in the Login
messages.pleaseEnterEmail: Use only english letters and numbers in the Login
messages.savePassword: Warning! Your password will be saved. Anyone who uses this computer will have access to your Chobot
messages.whyActivate: Why do I need to activate my account?
messages.localConnectionExists: You are already playing Chobots. Check other browser tabs
messages.parentRegistration: You are successfully registered. Check your email for the activation link
messages.youMustAgree: You have to agree to "Terms and Conditions" and rules first!
